Episodes.Title: Minimum Viable Product
Episodes.Writer: Mike Judge, John Altschuler, Dave Krinsky
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Richard is a computer programmer. He has to choose between a $10 million deal with Gavin Belson and a $200,000 deal with Peter Gregory, in exchange for his cooperation to make the idea of a super compressing algorithm change the worl

Episodes.Title: The Cap Table
Episodes.Writer: Carson Mell, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Richard hires Jared to design a business plan. Big Head is asked to work for Gavin Belson, where he discovers that Hooli has stolen the Pied Piper algorithm and calls it Nucleus. Meanwhile Richard struggles to get his money from Greg

Episodes.Title: Articles of Incorporation
Episodes.Writer: Matteo Borghese, Rob Turbovsky, Mike Judge
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: The guys find themselves in trouble with their company name when they find out it's already taken. So whilst Richard tries to find a solution, Erlich searches for a new name in another dimension of his consciousness.

Episodes.Title: Fiduciary Duties
Episodes.Writer: Ron Weiner, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Richard drunkenly promises to make Erlich a board member, which he regrets the next morning. Big Head finds others at Hooli, who like him, have made careers out of doing nothing. Richard struggles to put Pied Piper's vision into word

Episodes.Title: Signaling Risk
Episodes.Writer: Jessica Gao, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Now that Pied Piper is the official company name, Erlich wants a logotype to go with it so he hires a very unexpected artist in for the job. Meanwhile Richard gets a tighter deadline for the project after a simple mistake.

Episodes.Title: Third Party Insourcing
Episodes.Writer: Dan O'Keefe, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Richard comes across a problem in the code writing and hires Kevin, a young kid, to write the code for him.

Episodes.Title: Proof of Concept
Episodes.Writer: Clay Tarver, Mike Judge, John Altschuler
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener
Episodes.Plot: Richard has trouble getting Pied Piper ready in time for the TechCrunch Disrupt, while Erlich realizes he slept with the wife of one of the judges of the contest.

Episodes.Title: Optimal Tip-To-Tip Efficiency
Episodes.Writer: Alec Berg, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by)
Episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Episodes.Plot: Pied Piper makes it to the next stage of Disrupt but runs into trouble with Hooli's presentation. The guys break out into a ridiculous argument and Richard tries to pull Pied Piper together before the big presentation.
